name: ClawKitchen
description: Local UI for managing OpenClaw recipes, teams, agents, cron jobs, and skills.

dev.description: Run Next.js in dev mode (no prebuild required).

dev.label: Dev mode
dev.help: If true, Kitchen runs in Next dev mode. For production packaging, set this to false and ship built assets.

host.label: Host
host.help: Default binds to localhost. For Tailscale remote access, bind to your Tailscale IP or 0.0.0.0 and set authToken.

authToken.label: Auth token
authToken.help: Required when host is not localhost. Used for HTTP Basic auth (username: kitchen).
